titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before his majestie at his court of Thebalds, on Sunday, Sept. 15. 1622 In the ordinary course of attendance. By Ios. Hall D.D.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Haviland for N. Butter,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The deceit of appearance.
Identified as STC 12714a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
